parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the peripheral configuration structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_LPCOMP_Type *p_reg, uint32_t mask, uint8_t irq_priority, bool enable)
memberdef.name: nrfy_lpcomp_int_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the specified LPCOMP interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be initialized.
Interrupt priority.
True if the interrupts are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the LPCOMP interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for processing the specified LPCOMP events.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of events to be processed, created by NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

simplesect.para: Mask of events that were generated and processed. To be checked against the result of NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

briefdescription.para: Function for reading the current state of the LPCOMP input.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The input voltage is below the threshold.
The input voltage is above the threshold.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_ref_set Function for setting the reference source.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
LPCOMP reference selection.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_ext_ref_set Function for setting the external analog reference source.

detaileddescription.para: To use external reference first call nrf_lpcomp_ref_set with NRF_LPCOMP_REF_EXT_REF argument.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
LPCOMP external analog reference selection.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_detection_set Function for setting the detection type.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
LPCOMP detection type.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_hysteresis_set Function for setting the hysteresis.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
LPCOMP comparator hysteresis.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_configure Function for configuring LPCOMP.

detaileddescription.para: This function powers on LPCOMP and configures it. LPCOMP is in DISABLE state after configuration, so it must be enabled before using it. All shorts are inactive, events are cleared, and LPCOMP is stopped.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_input_select Function for selecting an active LPCOMP input.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Input to be selected.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_enable Function for enabling the LPCOMP.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_disable Function for disabling the LPCOMP.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_result_get Function for getting the last LPCOMP compare result.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The last compare result. If 0, then VIN+ < VIN-. If 1, then VIN- < VIN+.
nrf_lpcomp_int_enable Function for enabling interrupts from LPCOMP.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_lpcomp_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_int_disable Function for disabling interrupts from LPCOMP.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_lpcomp_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_int_enable_check Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_lpcomp_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: Mask of enabled interrupts.
nrf_lpcomp_task_address_get Function for getting the address of the specified LPCOMP task register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
LPCOMP task.

simplesect.para: The address of the specified LPCOMP task.
nrf_lpcomp_event_address_get Function for getting the address of the specified LPCOMP event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
LPCOMP event.

simplesect.para: The address of the specified LPCOMP event.
nrf_lpcomp_shorts_enable Function for setting LPCOMP shorts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of shortcuts.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_shorts_disable Function for clearing LPCOMP shorts by mask.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of shortcuts.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_task_trigger Function for setting the specified LPCOMP task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
LPCOMP task to be set.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_event_clear Function for clearing the specified LPCOMP event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
LPCOMP event to be cleared.

simplesect.para: nrf_lpcomp_event_check Function for retrieving the state of the LPCOMP event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.
